revised_title: The Role of Placenta in Animal Reproduction and Development
tldr: The author discusses the structure and function of placentas in different animals, explaining how they vary based on the species and the care taken of the animal. The placenta's structure determines the length of gestation and helps prevent hybrid species from breeding. The author also suggests a new mode of classifying animals based on placenta structure.
